description: Unique entity identifier: ror id if available, otherwise uei id
Research Organization Registry id of the organization from https://ror.org/
US government-owned Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) for the organization (https://grants.nih.gov/grants/guide/notice-files/NOT-OD-21-170.html)
Data Universal Numbering System (DUNS) by Dun & Bradstreet
Unique identifier for geolocation from https://www.geonames.org/
Research Organization Registry landing page of the organization
